property.name: helperTextHTML
property.label: Helper Text
property.description: Helper text that will display ontop of the table. The helper text can be in HTML.

property.name: itemsPerPage
property.label: Items per page
property.description: The number of rows to display on the table per page.

property.name: receiptRowText
property.label: Receipt row text
property.description: Text to show when a receipt is available for a row.

property.name: noReceiptRowText
property.label: No receipt row text
property.description: Text to show when a receipt is NOT available for a row.

property.name: receiptContentPageName
property.label: Receipt Content Page Name
property.description: Content page name where static receipt info is held

property.name: noTableDataTextHTML
property.label: No Table Data Text
property.description: Message to display when the constituent has no data to display. Can be in HTML.
